columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the event bus.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the account permitted to write events to the current account.

columns.name: policy
columns.description: The policy that enables the external account to send events to your account.

columns.name: policy_std
columns.description: Contains the policy that enables the external account to send events to your account in a canonical form for easier searching.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to the bus.
